word: God cares for the colored people, and if we would co-operate with Him for the salvation of their souls, we must care for them, too, and become laborers together with Him. We need to repent before God, because we have neglected missionary work in the most abandoned part of God's moral vineyard. . . . We should rouse up to the interest that true Christians ought to feel for those who are depressed and morally degraded. . . .
